column5: I am 1 month out from this summers fly in with Slate Falls Outposts.  We will be fishing Miniss lake I am so pumped and with a few of these trips under my belt I am less stressed than my first one for sure.   	Worrying about weight, catching enough fish for meals and so on.   	Here are a few of the things I wish I knew ahead of time https://www.northernjacks.com/post/things-i-knew-before-my-first-fly-in-trip Cheers 	Andrew
